headline: Coterra Energy (CTRA): Assessing Valuation After Leadership Change and Raised 2025 Production Outlook
summary: Coterra Energy is making waves this quarter after announcing both a new Chief Accounting Officer and an increase in its 2025 production guidance. These strategic steps are occurring alongside a brighter backdrop for natural gas prices. See our latest analysis for Coterra Energy. Coterra Energy’s year has seen some ups and downs, but recent leadership changes and brighter production prospects appear to be lifting sentiment.
